attributes.action: The Prime Minister should face an inquiry into his actions on COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: To hold the cabinet and PM to account, ensuring that the safety of citizens in the UK has been appropriate and whether the government could have done more / could be doing more.
attributes.background:
Parliament, the public and an independent panel should chair an inquiry into the PM's actions on COVID-19 and whether they were/are sufficient.
If they were not, the panel should decide on the capability for the Prime Minister to remain in public office.
